Report.Query: select business_date AS BusinessDate, run_date as RunDate, BussId as BussId, route_id as RouteID, bus_id as BusID, bus_card as BusCard, shifttype as ShiftType, driver_name as DriverName, leave_station as LeaveStation, arrive_station as ArriveStation, actual_leavetime as ActualLeaveTime, actual_arrivetime as ActualArriveTime, actual_op_miles as ActualOpMiles, area_code as AreaCode, org_group as OrgGroup, org_group_id as OrgGroupId, row_number() over (order by leave_station) as RowNumber, count(*) over () as TotalItems From RPT_BUSIQUERY_DISPATCH_RECORD
